org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.tracker.statetracker

Interface StateTracker<E extends Updateable<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseHazelCastStateTracker, DeepAutoEncoderHazelCastStateTracker, HazelCastStateTracker

    public interface StateTracker<E extends Updateable<?>>
extends java.io.Serializable
    A StateTracker is a cross cluster monitor for state of workers and jobs that workers have. This is mainly used for tracking where training is at and for distribution of jobs across a cluster relative to worker availability.
